name: Inamorata and Sacrosanct Weapons
raw: ------------------------------ Ingredients ------------------------------ a Grey Glyph ( ie : #L "Grey Glyph of Aban" "218372" ) an Inamorata or Sacrosanct Weapon ( ie : #L "Inamorata Assault Rifle" "212302" ) ------------------------------ Recipe ------------------------------ Grey Glyph + Inamorata Weapon = an improved Inamorata Weapon ( ie : #L "Inamorata Bhotaar Assault Rifle" "212282" ) Skills: | ME,EE | ------------------------------ Details ------------------------------ #L "Grey Glyph of Aban" "218372" : Adds Sneak Attack #L "Grey Glyph of Ocra-Bhotaar" "218380" : Adds Burst and Fling Shot #L "Grey Glyph of Aban-Shere" "218392" : Adds Sneak Attack, Fast Attack and Brawl #L "Grey Glyph of Ocra-Roch" "218382" : Adds Fling Shot and Fullauto #L "Grey Glyph of Aban-Thar" "218390" : Adds Sneak Attack and Fast Attack #L "Grey Glyph of Ocra-Shere" "218378" : Adds Fling Shot and Aimed Shot #L "Grey Glyph of Bhotaar" "218364" : Adds Burst #L "Grey Glyph of Ocra-Xum" "218384" : Adds Burst and Fullauto #L "Grey Glyph of Enel" "218370" : Adds Brawl #L "Grey Glyph of Roch" "218366" : Adds Fullauto #L "Grey Glyph of Enel-Thar" "218388" : Adds Brawl and Fast Attack #L "Grey Glyph of Shere" "218368" : Adds Aimed Shot #L "Grey Glyph of Enel-Xum" "218386" : Adds Brawl and Dimach #L "Grey Glyph of Thar" "218374" : Adds Fast Attack #L "Grey Glyph of Ocra" "218362" : Adds Fling Shot #L "Grey Glyph of Xum" "218376" : Adds Dimach ------------------------------ Comments ------------------------------ see also #L "Turn Spirit Weapon" "/tell recipe 569" recipe.
